name: venture-compass-ai
description: AI-powered startup intelligence platform with 8-agent LangGraph orchestration

scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv .venv && (call .venv\Scripts\activate.bat & pip install -r requirements.txt) || (source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt)
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: npm run test:db && npm run test:api
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && python -c "import os, shutil; [shutil.rmtree(os.path.join(root, '__pycache__')) for root, dirs, files in os.walk('.') if '__pycache__' in dirs]"
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && python -c "import asyncio; from app.core.database import init_db, get_database; async def reset(): await init_db(); db = get_database(); collections = await db.list_collection_names(); [await db[c].drop() for c in collections]; print('Database reset complete'); asyncio.run(reset())"
